prompt: Professional morning routine: a consultant opens a time-tracking app at the start of the workday, coffee mug on desk, notebook, clean workspace, calm and focused mood.
scene: modern Scandinavian home office at sunrise, subtle plants and tidy desk
subject: single professional person beginning daily time registration in a generic app
style: high-quality editorial digital illustration, semi-flat with soft shading, polished and modern
composition: wide horizontal composition, subject slightly left-of-center, clear breathing room, medium shot
lighting: warm morning sunlight through window, soft natural shadows
palette: teal, sage green, warm neutrals, off-white background accents
constraints: no logos, no product brands, no readable UI text, keep scene professional and trustworthy
negative: watermark, distorted anatomy, extra fingers, cluttered background, neon colors, cartoon exaggeration

prompt: Data analytics journey: time data transforms into clear insights with charts, trend lines, and comparison cards for productivity planning.
scene: clean digital workspace with large analytics display and floating chart elements
subject: analyst interpreting dashboard with bar chart, line chart, and pie chart in a coherent layout
style: modern vector-like illustration with subtle depth, enterprise SaaS style
composition: wide horizontal composition, central dashboard focal point, balanced visual hierarchy
lighting: bright neutral studio light, crisp and clean
palette: teal, green, muted blue, light gray, white
constraints: no logos, no brand marks, no readable gibberish text, charts must look structured and believable
negative: watermark, noisy textures, random symbols, oversaturated colors, visual chaos

prompt: Documentation and collaboration: cross-functional team reviews a case together, sharing notes and building a reusable knowledge base.
scene: meeting table in a professional office with documents, laptop, and organized notes
subject: diverse team of colleagues collaborating respectfully around case documentation
style: editorial business illustration, soft geometric forms, refined details
composition: wide horizontal composition, top-angled perspective over the table, clear focal interaction
lighting: soft indoor daylight, welcoming and confident mood
palette: sand, olive, teal, warm gray, cream
constraints: no logos, no explicit readable text on documents, professional attire, collaborative body language
negative: watermark, uncanny faces, distorted hands, crowding, dark moody lighting
